attributes.action: Honour Simon Weston CBE with a knighthood!
attributes.background: Simon served Queen and Country with honour and dedication he was horrifically wounded in the line of duty when his ship was bombed during the Falklands conflict he has suffered over 70 operations he is devoted to supporting our veterans! I feel he should be given a Knighthood!

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
